name: Sonoco Products Company
description: Sonoco Products Company is a global provider of consumer packaging, industrial products, and protective packaging. Founded in 1899 and headquartered in Hartsville, South Carolina, Sonoco has built a strong reputation for innovation and sustainability in the packaging industry. The company operates in multiple segments, including Consumer Packaging, which focuses on flexible packaging, rigid plastic containers, and paperboard packaging; Industrial Products, which includes tubes, cores, and protective packaging solutions; and Protective Solutions, which offers a wide range of protective packaging and services for various industries. Sonoco is committed to sustainability and has set ambitious goals to reduce its environmental footprint, including increasing the use of recycled content and improving the recyclability of its products. With a diverse product portfolio and a commitment to customer service, Sonoco serves a wide range of markets, including food and beverage, personal care, healthcare, and industrial applications. The company is recognized for its strong emphasis on innovation, continuously developing new packaging solutions that meet the evolving needs of its customers while promoting a circular economy. Sonoco's mission is to provide high-quality packaging solutions that enhance product performance and deliver value to its customers, while also contributing positively to the environment and society.
